column5: You had a great opportunity to make a move at her house. The fact she leaned into your chest was a massive sign but doesn't mean you've missed your chance. Just spend more time with her and when you feel like the times right make the move.
The thing is there are occasions when I ejaculate a fuck load but the majority of the time theres only a few drops. You're right though. Need to see a doc

I find it really difficult to go to a friends and watch a film because my anxiety affects my concentration making it difficult to understand the film. And its not just my friends but my family too. The only time I can pay attention to a film is usually by myself and rarely with friends if its an entertaining film. 

It really upsets me because I just want to be able to relax with my loved ones but my anxiety prevents me from being able to.
The most exciting part of my day is getting in to bed.
